remarks: A closed subspace sum equals Hilbert lattice join.  Part of Lemma 31.1.5 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 136.  (Contributed by NM, 30-Nov-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
shjshs.1 $e |- A e. SH $.
shjshs.2 $e |- B e. SH $.
shjshseli $p |- ( ( A +H B ) e. CH <-> ( A +H B ) = ( A vH B ) ) $.
